title: Outcome-Based Education (OBE)-Enhanced Mathematics Competency Development Program

context.additional_context: A process where working professionals learn OBE-model-applicable mathematical concepts for workplace integration. Active learning strategies utilizing personal devices (BYOD) are implemented

learning_goals: Learners can achieve three or more math-related course outcomes (COs) defined in the OBE framework.
Learners can apply mathematical modeling techniques to solve real-world work problems with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can effectively present mathematical analysis results in team projects through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
